title: Super Deluxe Twin

title: Infinity Sea View
description: Best sea view hotel in Cox’s Bazar offering you a generous 500 square feet of space, Infinity Sea View Rooms have a King bed for a refreshing and restful night’s sleep. Rooms have a spacious balcony that opens to a pool view and best sea view in Cox’s bazar. Also rooms all equipped with modern amenities such as LCD TVs, central air conditioning, central water heating system, room controller etc.
amenities: Single Room With One Spacious Balcony​
Sea View King Bed, Bathroom With Luxury Fittings

title: Junior Suite
description: A suit with an additional meeting space keeps your vacation uninterrupted. All our suits are ornamented with the magnificent view of the beautiful sea view of Bay of Bengal.
amenities: One Bed Room, 1.5 Bath, Living/Dining & Kitchenette
Sea View With Two Spacious Balconies

title: Panorama Ocean Suite
description: A luxurious 2 bedroom suit perfect for family & friends with the 180 degree view of world’s longest unbroken beach. The ceiling height window from the living room gives you an excellent opportunity to indulge with Sun, Sand & Sea.
amenities: Two Bed Room, 2.5 Bath, Living/Dining & Kitchenette
180-Degree Sea View With Two Large Balconies
